about.p1: I am a Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience building scalable, high-quality web and mobile applications. I enjoy tackling complex problems and turning them into clean, intuitive user interfaces through thoughtful architecture and attention to detail.
about.p2: Driven by curiosity and a strong product mindset, I continuously refine my skills and embrace new technologies. Throughout my career I've collaborated with companies of different sizes, from startups to enterprise organizations, handling everything front-end: from component architecture to state management, API integrations to design systems.
about.p3: Great software is the result of solid engineering practices combined with a deep focus on user experience and long-term maintainability. Today I work as a freelancer, helping my clients turn their ideas into modern and functional interfaces.

items.description: Collaborating with multiple companies as a front-end consultant. Refactored large-scale React/Next.js codebases to improve scalability and introduced robust testing strategies. Built complex management platforms from scratch with advanced workflows, role-based permissions and map integrations. Led the development of back-office applications and a cross-platform mobile app for a startup. Created an accessible financial guidance platform following WCAG guidelines. Engineered a comprehensive CRM system focused on performance and seamless UX.

Implemented design guidelines and developed new applications from scratch. Designed the entire user experience using Figma. Utilized Micro Frontend architecture with Module Federation for modular, scalable solutions. Developed a comprehensive testing suite for E2E and unit testing.

Developed software from scratch using Vue.js and TypeScript. Designed the entire user flow and graphical interface using Figma and Penpot. Contributed to the testing strategy by implementing E2E test coverage and unit testing.

Developed new applications for document management and digital signing. Established frontend guidelines for external and internal collaborators and designed a corporate theme for Material UI to speed up the creation of new applications.
CRM development and database management for an energy management company.
Developed and modified WPF applications. Utilized software tools for mapping source system data (XML, flat files, CSV, EDIFACT) to data warehouse tables.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. Achieved a GPA of 3.7 on the American GPA scale (on a scale of 4.0), equivalent to 92 points.
